references.paper_title: Communication-efficient learning of deep networks from decentralized data
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of federated learning, introducing the communication-efficient learning framework that the current work builds upon.

references.paper_title: Advances and open problems in federated learning
references.reason: This survey paper provides a comprehensive overview of federated learning, outlining key challenges and research directions which the current work addresses.

references.paper_title: Communication-efficient distributed optimization using an approximate Newton-type method
references.reason: This paper introduces DANE, a key algorithm in federated optimization that achieves optimal communication complexity, and is directly improved upon in this work.

references.paper_title: Scaffold: Stochastic controlled averaging for federated learning
references.reason: This paper introduces the SCAFFOLD algorithm, a significant improvement over FedAvg that addresses the client drift problem, and whose performance is compared against in this work.

references.paper_title: Contracting proximal methods for smooth convex optimization
references.reason: This paper provides key theoretical tools and insights regarding proximal methods, which are central to the development of the novel stabilized algorithms in this work.
